COPlj
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
Sent for the information of
Harry J. Skornla
Station KOOK
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
December 31, 1957
Mr, William Bender
Station WUOM
University of Michigan
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Dear Bill*
Thank you for consenting to serve as chairman of the
MAEB Public Relations Committee in 1958,
Other members include Curtis, Dudley, Pryrsire, Howe and
Sulzer.
I am also continuing you on the International Relations
Committee (with Siegel, chairman, and Alec Sutherland). With
such a small group, and some pressure for closer liaison and
at least one meeting, I hope we can overcome the problem
raised in your recent letter to Si Siegel.
Yours sincerely.
Burton Paulu
President
BP ids
cct Harry J. Skoraia
Jack McBride
